title: Are certificates from NIIT more valid than online EDX certificates? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it is a little difficult to compare these two as they both have a completely different approach to learning. NIIT is based on comprehensive learning in a classroom while edX is an online course. I personally feel that NIIT would be a better option as NIIT has a curriculum which is designed comprehensively. Also,NIIT is the best in it’s field as it does a good job of creating a positive and encouraging learning environment which is unparalleled by any other technology institute and obviously a digital platform can’t match that environment. Overall, NIIT is not only a safer but a better option in all respect. Now coming to the certification, NIIT certificates hold a great value and are widely recognized by all leaders of the industry as NIIT gives in-depth knowledge of the IT sector and also acts as a gateway to the industry. Holding a NIIT certificate gives you an advantage over other candidates as NIIT is known to prepare their candidates directly for the industries.

Well, NIIT certificates are better than any online courses any day. Reason, being the curriculum and faculty two major things which decide the value of any course. And, The learning one gets out of these certificates. Also, almost every educational training provider have their resources available online.
